comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1

Unable to hover element, because mouseover event loose target object and firing on active element randomly. Not reproduced on Win platform.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Login to ToDoYu demo site
2. Select Todo's tab
3. Right click on any task
4. Try to select any option from "Change status" list.



No CSS workaround founded.
